oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An iterative approach to higher polyquinanes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
SIVAKUMAR, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: gamma-lactones
delta-lactones
oxidative cyclization
dodecahedranes
hydroboration
facile
polyquinanes
polycyclic aliphatic compounds
hydrogenation
and grignard reactions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A simple cyclopentane annulation strategy has been developed using inexpensive reagents. Starting from the readily available bicyclo[3.3.0]octane system several polyquinanes were prepared by iterative annulation procedure and herein we report a short and a convenient route to a new C-20-hexaquinane system.
